author: ryanleeschneider
content: Is finding peers on Sepolia extremely slow for others as well?  I started some new nodes and several minutes later they still have mostly between 0 and 4 peers.

author: daniellehrner
content: I guess most clients don’t yet have the DNS configuration for Sepolia added, as it’s fairly new.  Just today I added it to Besu and could do a snap sync in just a few minutes, with a steady number of peers.
